message.content:
cs.CV, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI. 

The paper proposes a technique to improve the search efficiency of the bag-of-words method for image retrieval, which is a common problem in computer vision and information retrieval. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also introduces a stopping problem and stopping rules, which are related to decision-making and optimization, suggesting that it could also belong to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The use of feature vector-quantization and difficulty measurement could also place it in cs.MM (Multimedia). Finally, the paper proposes a method to reduce computational cost, which could be relevant to cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
